name: Ginger Bopp
text: Not open anymore..drove out of my way for nothing

name: Ryan Gabbard
text: Friendly staff, always fresh and good food. I hadn't been to a little caesars in years before and this one got me back into it big time. Super quick takeout, so if you want good pizza fast and you're on route 19, this is a good bet. …More

name: Christopher Sanchez
text:
Fast service, polite crew, great pies
Seriously fast even when busy.
The $6 large pepperoni is the way to go. I grab 3 to feed the fam of four. …More

name: Patrick Hayes
text: Unlike most locations, the Pittsburgh Little Caesars refuses to sell garlic bread ("Crazy Bread") without being bundled with a sauce, overpricing it to $4, which is almost their same price for a full pizza ($5). Not cool!

name: Chris Eagleton
text: The food is good but there is a long wait most of the time. I was the first one there to order but other people got there pizza first. Then the kid was just standing there.

name: Scott McDougall
text: It was fresh. And it was cheap. Only had to wait a couple minutes and it was delicious!

name: William Thompson
text: What's not to like? It's kind of crappy pizza, but you only pay five bucks for it. For a little bit the pizzas I got here were very dry, but they've since gotten way better.

name: Kolten Kris Christ
text: For how fast the pizza was made, it was fantastic, and the people who work here seem pretty cool. Only reason not a 5, there is definitely better pizza out there, but I'll probably end up coming here more.

name: Dan Wilson
text: I'd have yet to experience good customer service here. This time the guy sighed bc I wanted a menu item pizza, that he had to make. He was bothered by my request of only one simple pizza. That after paying I found out was already assembled …More

name: Lisa Engram
text: Quick meals cheap and good

name: Chris Hyatt
text: As of at least today (8/31) this location is permanently closed. I just left from there and they have signs on their door

name: Michael Turnbull
text: Recently read in a local paper that an employee was caught tampering with food. Driving by a few days later, the employee is still working there. Combined with a filthy interior and lukewarm food, I do not recommend.

name: Ray Pader
text: Probably the best fast food style pizza.  Better than Pizza Hut, Dominos and Papa Johns.

name: Love It
text: Good pizza, better breadsticks, best value for dollar

name: Brett Melton
text: Some of the best pizza in town for an affordable price!!

name: Pastor Lee
text: If she should have really good job just when I got that one order it was a little cold but it's a pretty good place

name: Woodrow W Frazier, Jr
text: We love the Pizza and the price is so right,also close to home.

name: Courtney Boso
text: Very nice people there always fast and helpful. I fully recommend this establishment.

name: Chris Ober
text:
Ordered here a handful of times. Front desk is typically unfriendly. Attitude.

Otherwise. Food quality is solid.

name: M Mck
text: There were many issues with this place over a year ago.  They hired a new manager who actually cares now.

name: Vincent Iachini
text: Very quick service even while understaffed. Consistent pizza at a great price!

name: Elaina Valencia
text: Great service fast and friendly Pizza Delicious

name: Janice Kerner
text: Not one of my favorite shop.  To bready.

name: Cathy Montgomery
text: Good for a quick meal.

name: John Freiberger
text: Awesome food and awesome service

name: Melinda Jones
text: It was an okay pizza place but it's shut down now. Has been for the past month.

name: Melissa Engler
text: Great pizza , .. there was a confusion on our order but they remade our pizza and gave us free bread sticks :)

name: Shartayua Mason
text: Pizza wasn't that great and the pizza was not ready so we ended up waiting.

name: Serendipity Jones
text: inconsistent at best, even if you call ahead.

name: sam muss
text: I love this pizza, it’s the best

name: DuAne Ebitz
text: The gentleman who waited on me was not very helpful

name: Gwendolyn Marcus
text: You can't beat the price and the pizza is delicious

name: Rachel mcgovern
text: Love cheese bread sticks

name: Chelsea Parson
text: Always hot not always ready.

name: Mary Ann M
text: Simply the best!!

name: John Fascetti
text: Permanently closed

name: Gregory Thomas
text: Hot and Ready.

name: J M
text: Took forever to get pizza

name: Anita's Beauty
text: Very good pizza

name: Trey Leeper
text: Fast and good

name: Kevin McBee
text: Should be called never ready

name: jimmy avitts
text: Bad customer service

name: Tim Clemons
text: Great customer service

name: cosine
text: The food wasn't great.

name: G P
text: Poor quality of the pizza in the holding oven

name: Marilyn Jackson
text: Great pizza

name: Mike Wold
text: Average Pizza place. Hardly any parking.

name: Kalaidescope Collective
text: Hot and ready

name: Tiffany Allen
text: Quick and easy

name: Quinn Favo
text: The usual Little Caesar's experience

name: gabriel michael
text: Lady who said she the Boss , I ask her to wash her hands you not after Wait on other customers touching money.
